name: Changing of the Guardian
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Rob LaZebnik, Jon Kern (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Homer and Marge find the perfect young couple and ask them to be the guardians for the kids in case something happens to them.
